desc.p: A system maintained field. Set to YES when any record in SECURITY.MASTER has a value corresponding to this alternate index.
NOINPUT
Specify the Minimum length for ALT.SECURITY.NO in SECURITY.MASTER
Mandatory Input
Value should be less then MAX.LENGTH
Short description for alternate security.
1 - 35 Alphanumeric characters, free format description. Multilanguage field.
Mandatory input.
This field holds the Maximum length that is allowed for the ALT.SECURITY.NO field in SECURITY.MASTER
If MAX.LENGTH is greater than the SEC.ID.LENGTH field in SC.PARAMETER, then SEC.ID.LENGTH is overwritten with the current value of MAX.LENGTH
Mandatory input
The value should be greater than MIN.LENGTH
Details of the name and particulars of the alternate security.

This field may be expanded to allow the user to enter the alternate security description in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language on the LANGUAGE table and will indicate to the user the language in which the "COMPANY.NAME" is to be entered.
1 - 35 Alphanumeric characters, free format description. Multilanguage field.
The contents of this field displays ALT.SECURITY.NO as specified.
If the value stored in DISPLAY.MASK is ###-###. And the value entered in ALT.SECURITY.NO in SECURITY.MASTER is 123456, then value would be displayed as 123-456.
Specify the type of format for ALT.SECURITY.NO
E.g. The format can be 2A3N2A, which would mean 2 Alpha - 3 Numeric - 2 Alpha
The key to the record, used to identify the alternative key. Will be used in SECURITY.MASTER field ALT.SECURITY.ID to identify the alternative lookup key in field ALT.SECURITY.NO.
